title: Wear Messenger DEMO
description: *** THERE IS NO MALWARE IN WEAR MESSENGER. IF YOUR ANTIVIRUS SAYS THERE IS, IT'S A FALSE POSITIVE (please, get a better antivirus!) ***Wear Messenger is an app which greatly expands your ways to send SMS, Gmail, Hangouts, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger messages with your fingers.THIS IS A DEMO VERSION.The purpose of this version is to let you evaluate if Wear Messenger is worth your money or not. It contains several limitations, such as:- No notifications- Notification linking not available- Only one conversation visible- Only two messages per conversation- Only five contacts available- No xposed moduleHowever, we left all the settings to let you see what you can actually change/have in the full version.
descriptionHTML:
*** THERE IS NO MALWARE IN WEAR MESSENGER. IF YOUR ANTIVIRUS SAYS THERE IS, IT'S A FALSE POSITIVE (please, get a better antivirus!) ***


Wear Messenger is an app which greatly expands your ways to send SMS, Gmail, Hangouts, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger messages with your fingers.


THIS IS A DEMO VERSION.


The purpose of this version is to let you evaluate if Wear Messenger is worth your money or not. It contains several limitations, such as:
- No notifications
- Notification linking not available
- Only one conversation visible
- Only two messages per conversation
- Only five contacts available
- No xposed module

However, we left all the settings to let you see what you can actually change/have in the full version.
comments: i can only give it an okay, the thing here is right off, this keyboard is horrible! this messenger works, and that's a great thing, but seriously this keyboard?  just isn't doable.

Love it Can't fault it.  Texts great,  just this minute found the keyboard capability and quick replies so trying  that now. If that works OK I'll no doubt buy full version to see what extras I get :)

Poop This demo version is so incredibly limited you can't even use it. The only contacts I can send a message to are the first five in your phone book, which for me is my Verizon contact, ex. #bal #pay, etc. Why would I pay for something when I can't even demo it?
Help Cannot get it to sync to my LG Urbane 2, it is the only Android Wear app I can't get to the watch
Useless on LG Urbane 2 as it won't send from the watch's own cell number.
AW 2.0 isout but this SMS still uses its own shortcuts and text input..not what I was looking. Also no inbox.
